name: fortls-lfortran
description: LFortran language server protocol (LSP) implementation for FortLS.
author: LCompilers

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.server.cwd.description: The working directory from which to launch the server.
FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.server.cwd.markdownDescription:
The working directory from which to launch the server.
If blank, this will default to the `examples/servers` directory.

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.server.debu.description: Enable debugging of the server process.
The host on which the server process to debug is running.
The port number on which the server process to debug is listening.

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.server.laun.description: The python script to run when launching the server.
FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.server.laun.markdownDescription:
The python script to run when launching the server.
 Relative to #FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.server.cwd#

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.server.pyth.description:
The python interpreter to use to run the server.
By default, this extension will attempt to use the Python interpreter configured via the Python extension, setting this setting will override this behavior.

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.trace.serve.description: Controls if LSP messages send to/from the server should be logged.
enumDescriptions: do not log any lsp messages
log all lsp messages sent to/from the server
log all lsp messages sent to/from the server, including their contents

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.maxNumberOf.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.compiler.lf.description: The path to the LFortran compiler executable.

FortLSLFortranLanguageServer.compiler.fl.description: Additional flags to pass to the LFortran compiler.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && pip install --upgrade --force-reinstall ./server --target out/server/python && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && pip install --upgrade --force-reinstall ./server --target out/server/python && node esbuild.js --production
